long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that allows you to use hidewall.io to quickly bypass paywalls.

What this does is read the current URL, and then opens a new tab to take you to https://hidewall.io/yeet?y=$URL, where $URL is what is read from your current tab.

This extension, and the hidewall.io site are all open source, and may be inspected at: https://github.com/sashakarcz/hidewall
